channel.title: Question targeted to developers or very knowledgeable users
channel.description:
Hello,
How will i be able to get / create the equivalent of the attached content below for Black Mesa ?
TF [url]https://pastebin.com/KMnnetti[/url] L4D2 [url]https://pastebin.com/yfYzynpw[/url] CS:GO [url]https://pastebin.com/mPbLnaZA[/url]
Help is very appreciated :thumbup:

item.title: Question targeted to developers or very knowledgeable users
item.dc:creator: AvoidPaypal
item.description:
Crypt:

How do you expect people to help you if you won’t even explain what it is you need help with?

I need to find out all the chat (triggers? not sure what to call them) so i can hook them and use in a plugin.

Lets take an example from Team Fortress;
https://pastebin.com/KMnnetti

What is “TF_Chat_All” replaced with in Black Mesa ?

Read full topic
item.source: Question targeted to developers or very knowledgeable users
